bibl.title: Oral Performance and its Context
bibl.note: A version of this paper was delivered on 5 July 2002 at the Fifth Biennial Conference on Orality and Literacy in Ancient Greece, University of Melbourne. Relies mainly on: 1. P. Lond. VII, 2033 recto; - 2. P.S.I. IV, 379; - 3. P. Cairo Zenon III, 59330; - 4. P. Cairo Zenon III, 59439 recto.
bibl.seg: EVANS Trevor V., Orality, Greek Literacy, and Early Ptolemaic Papyri.
C.J. MACKIE (Ed.), Oral Performance and its Context = Orality and Literacy in Ancient Greece. 5 = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 248 (Leiden, 2004) pp. 195-208.
145.4 P. Cairo Zenon III, 59330; 59439 recto P. Lond. VII, 2033 recto P.S.I. IV, 379
